title: Shadowland: Blood on the Streets (Trade Paperback)
description: Silver Sable, Paladin, Misty Knight and the Shroud! Four very different heroes, all ensnared in a murder mystery haunting the streets of Shadowland! Is Daredevil using his army of Hand ninjas to kill mobsters untouchable by the law, or is something even more sinister spreading throughout the city? An international bounty hunter, a mercenary, a detective and a vigilante — can this quartet of strange bedfellows put their differences aside and come together before death strikes again? Collecting SHADOWLAND: BLOOD ON THE STREETS #1-4.
